replies.body: Marksmen (Patch 6.9): "Oh look they have a Zed... aaaaaand now I'm 0/10"
Mages (Patch 6.9): _"Oh look they have a Zed... aaaaaand I'm out of mana under my tower"_
Mages )Patch 6.9):"Oh look they have a Zed... buys Zhonyas"
Mages (Patch 6.9): _"Oh look I bought Zhonya... aaaaaand now I'm out of mana under my tower even sooner"_
And the fact that it got massively nerfed lol.
_"But the cost doe!"_ ~ Riot 2016
And CDR!

Which every respectable mage player already had capped.

What am I suppose to do with 50% CDR?
Just use Qss instead of Zhonyas lel

QSS no longer removes Zed's Death Mark.

Because favouritism.
That's the joke.
{{champion:67}} _"Joke? What do you mean?"_
Oh, look. I finally finished my Zhonya's. Aaaaaand defeat.
oh look i bought zhonyas to bad he gets ult twice before it recharges. oh and im out of mana under my tower faster
"Oh look, we banned Zed and now he's not a problem."
Because relying on bans is a responsible way to balance a game...
Magikarp would like to have a word with you...
So basically every item gives cooldown, if you fall behind you really have NO chance of winning because of these new dragons, a 20 min advantage with rift herald, and so much more
This isn't a game of snowballs anymore. It's a game of avalanches.
Sneezing has never been so deadly

Top
Jungle
Bot
Support
Zed

Looks like I came early for 6.9. 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
i believe they make a pill for that.
"Regeneration overall is a bit too free, so we’re taking some of botlane’s mana as well." Nerf's support item.{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

Wow, although the layout change for Champions is nice it made reading a pain. For those that do not have large screens, you need to read keep scrolling up and down to change between champions. Having the icons to the side may have been more effective.

Hey there! The table of contents to the side should offer the same sort of functionality as the icons to the side would -- if you click on the title of the section you're in, it'll open up a list of everything in that section. You can quickly go from champion to champion without needing to scroll back up. Hope that helps!

Hi thanks for the reply. I noticed that as well and should have mentioned in my post. The table of contents definitely helped but it wasn't intuitive that it would expand to show champs. Perhaps an indicator is needed? Instead, I thought the link would just be bringing me back to the bookmarked part of the page.

Appreciate your reply Riot Avari!
No problem! And thank you very much for your feedback.
Personally i'm not a fan of the black background. Makes it kinda hard to read imo.
it's easier on your monitor and easier on your eyes, mentally you might not like it but it's good for you

NEW - REWARDING Now regenerates 1 health every 3 seconds after 5 seconds out of combat.

This is the biggest change for high elo supports, since now that we can't take down some of it's health and then run back to clean up the rest later due to safety. This will definitely change how we ward in competitive and high elo.
the real change here is jhin can kill a pink without waiting for a reload
I think you should have increased anivia's R to at least 500 radius if you were going to let it max at a size over time
Just because you can change everything, dosent mean you should. Not looking forward to any of these changes.

I have yet to play on it but just by reading it this is the worst patch I have seen in two years, nerfing mana regen to nonexistence, taking away most spell vamp and nerfing any way for a mid laner to deal with zed one of the most op mids out there- zhonyas nerfed, QSS no longer works and spell vamp to trade with him is gone..
Any GOOD caster mage has no use for this 15% of damage taken is returned as mana, if you are positioned correctly your team should make you nearly untouchable so.. thanks for that. 
I don't even mid main I just see how hard they got shit on this patch and am in aw.
Zhonya's may have got a major nerf to it's ap power, but it is so flipping cheap that you can get it a lot easier.
Can get it earlier but Zeds Ult will still be up WAY before Zonyas comes off CD so all you do is delay whats coming to you cuz your only lifeline is now beyond reach

Yeah but they gave Zed windows of power against Zhonya's instead of making one item an insta-win against the champion...  Besides the CDR in Zhonya's is actually great because think of how many champions would love to hit the 40% CDR cap but only get to 30% currently...  Oriana, Vel'Koz, Ziggs, Karma, etc., etc.
I'm actually surprised it didn't have CDR in retrospect considering it's an hourglass after all.
So Malzahar/Warwick still going to suck because QSS still dumps on them, while Zed becomes even harder to play against. nice.
So now ADC's have no way to counter the already oppressive zed except dont get near him? Ok.
I'm really not looking forward to any of these changes...

I love that mages are getting reworked. sweet better kits more damage. but why... why why why take away magic resist on the main MR items then. That's going to make these mages ridiculously op when they come out isn't it?
AP items are getting hit and already all you needed to do aganist most mages was to merely buy the Cowl.
Let's look at Ziggs for a second, the new must pick ban in pro play.  In this lane swap meta, 25% lvl 1 execute on towers.  Is that support ziggs incoming? I think so.

Play tank Veigar
Still do tons of damage
Is it just me, or is the whole "stacks toward empowered basic attack" mechanic becoming _really_ stale and overused?

The jungle timer changes went through to live...there has been a lot of disappointing and sad changes over the years riot but this by far is the worst one.  There are 2 changes in this patch that are awful  and its debatable which one is worse.  The rift herald change or the jungle timer change.  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
If it has more negative than positive effects on live they'll follow it up.
